mapper.select: select OR_NO as orNo,StuName as stuName,StuNO as stuNo,Class as stuClazz,BookNO as bookNo,BookName as bookName,BorrowTime as borrowTime,returnTime as returnTime from stuborrow where StuName like #{username} limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
select count(OR_NO) from stuborrow where BookName like #{username}
mapper.update: update stuborrow set StuName = #{stuName},StuNO = #{stuNo},Class = #{stuClazz},BookNO = #{bookNo},BookName = #{bookName},BorrowTime = #{borrowTime},returnTime = #{returnTime} where OR_NO = #{orNo}
delete from stuborrow where OR_NO in (${value})
